templates.description: Use this template for a policy landing page.
templates.templateHtml:
On this page:

  • Policy statement
  • Objectives
  • Priorities
  • More information
  • Documents

Policy statement

[Brief statement of the policy]

Objectives

  • [List the objectives of the policy]
  •  

Priorities

  • [List the current priorities of the policy]
  •  

More information

[Describe where the reader can get more information, including contact details if required]

Documents

Read the following documents for more information:

  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)
  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)

templates.description: Use this template for a program landing page.
templates.templateHtml:
[Introduction – one or two paragraphs summarising the program]

On this page:

  • Overview
  • Updates
  • Documents

Overview

[What are we doing and why? Who will benefit?]

What is available?

[Describe the services/funding/resources available]

FAQs

[Question]

[Answer]

[Question]

[Answer]

[Question]

[Answer]

More information

[Describe where the reader can get more information, including contact details if required]

Latest news

[Describe recent events related to the program – e.g. new application dates, funding round announcements]

Updates

The following table describes changes to this program since it started.

DateChangesDetails
[dd/mm/yyyy][Summarise the changes][Describe the changes in detail]
   
   

Documents

Read the following documents for more information:

  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)
  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)
  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)

templates.description: Use this template for a grants and funding landing page.
templates.templateHtml:
Available funding

Up to $[amount] per [funding block - e.g. year, program etc.]

Application dates

From [dd/mm/yyyy] to [dd/mm/yyyy].

Contact details

  • Phone: [phone number]
  • Email: [email address]
  • Website: [URL]

How to apply

[Describe the application process]

The following documents are available to assist applicants:

  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)
  • [document title] (PDF xxx KB, DOCX xxx KB)

Overview

Short description: [Describe the grant in no more than one sentence]

[Describe the grant/program and requirements in more detail]

Applications are now [open/closed] to round [n] of funding.

Previous funding rounds

  • [link to page listing successful applications]
  •
